## Professional Background

With over 3 years of experience at TCS, working on application development, business reporting, data analysis and firefighting issues, I have gained expertise in software development and business intelligence. Working with a North American based banking client and dealing with its data on a daily basis helped me gain technical as well as domain knowledge of the banking sector. It has also made me well versed with the work culture of North American companies. I had to analyze and deal with large amounts of customer and mortgage data in order to prepare business reports, develop software applications and solve business problems and queries. In my 3 years I have worked on many projects in the banking and finance domain !
